00042 /*
00043     @global
00044     @group CPViewAutoresizingMasks
00045     The default resizingMask, the view will not resize or reposition itself.
00046 */
00047 CPViewNotSizable    = 0;
00048 /*
00049     @global
00050     @group CPViewAutoresizingMasks
00051     Allow for flexible space on the left hand side of the view.
00052 */
00053 CPViewMinXMargin    = 1;
00054 /*
00055     @global
00056     @group CPViewAutoresizingMasks
00057     The view should grow and shrink horizontally with its parent view.
00058 */
00059 CPViewWidthSizable  = 2;
00060 /*
00061     @global
00062     @group CPViewAutoresizingMasks
00063     Allow for flexible space to the right hand side of the view.
00064 */
00065 CPViewMaxXMargin    = 4;
00066 /*
00067     @global
00068     @group CPViewAutoresizingMasks
00069     Allow for flexible space above the view.
00070 */
00071 CPViewMinYMargin    = 8;
00072 /*
00073     @global
00074     @group CPViewAutoresizingMasks
00075     The view should grow and shrink vertically with its parent view.
00076 */
00077 CPViewHeightSizable = 16;
00078 /*
00079     @global
00080     @group CPViewAutoresizingMasks
00081     Allow for flexible space below the view.
00082 */
00083 CPViewMaxYMargin    = 32;

00196 + (void)initialize
00197 {
00198     if (self !== [CPView class])
00199         return;
00200 
00201 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00202     DOMElementPrototype =  document.createElement("div");
00203     
00204     var style = DOMElementPrototype.style;
00205     
00206     style.overflow = "hidden";
00207     style.position = "absolute";
00208     style.visibility = "visible";
00209     style.zIndex = 0;
00210 #endif
00211 
00212     CachedNotificationCenter = [CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter];

00215 - (void)setupViewFlags
00216 {
00217     var theClass = [self class],
00218         classUID = [theClass UID];
00219 
00220     if (CPViewFlags[classUID] === undefined)
00221     {
00222         var flags = 0;
00223 
00224         if ([theClass instanceMethodForSelector:@selector(drawRect:)] !== [CPView instanceMethodForSelector:@selector(drawRect:)])
00225             flags |= CPViewHasCustomDrawRect;
00226 
00227         if ([theClass instanceMethodForSelector:@selector(layoutSubviews)] !== [CPView instanceMethodForSelector:@selector(layoutSubviews)])
00228             flags |= CPViewHasCustomLayoutSubviews;
00229 
00230         CPViewFlags[classUID] = flags;
00231     }
00232 
00233     _viewClassFlags = CPViewFlags[classUID];
00234 }

00255 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00256 {
00257     self = [super init];
00258     
00259     if (self)
00260     {
00261         var width = _CGRectGetWidth(aFrame),
00262             height = _CGRectGetHeight(aFrame);
00263         
00264         _subviews = [];
00265         _registeredDraggedTypes = [CPSet set];
00266         _registeredDraggedTypesArray = [];
00267 
00268         _tag = -1;
00269 
00270         _frame = _CGRectMakeCopy(aFrame);
00271         _bounds = _CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, width, height);
00272 
00273         _autoresizingMask = CPViewNotSizable;
00274         _autoresizesSubviews = YES;
00275     
00276         _opacity = 1.0;
00277         _isHidden = NO;
00278         _hitTests = YES;
00279 
00280 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00281         _DOMElement = DOMElementPrototype.cloneNode(false);
00282 
00283         CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMElement, NULL, _CGRectGetMinX(aFrame), _CGRectGetMinY(aFrame));
00284         CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMElement, width, height);
00285         
00286         _DOMImageParts = [];
00287         _DOMImageSizes = [];
00288 #endif
00289         
00290         _theme = [CPTheme defaultTheme];
00291         _themeState = CPThemeStateNormal;
00292 
00293         [self setupViewFlags];
00294 
00295         [self _loadThemeAttributes];
00296     }
00297     
00298     return self;
00299 }

00342 - (void)addSubview:(CPView)aSubview positioned:(CPWindowOrderingMode)anOrderingMode relativeTo:(CPView)anotherView
00343 {
00344     var index = anotherView ? [_subviews indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:anotherView] : CPNotFound;
00345     
00346     // In other words, if no view, then either all the way at the bottom or all the way at the top.
00347     if (index === CPNotFound)
00348         index = (anOrderingMode === CPWindowAbove) ? [_subviews count] : 0;
00349     
00350     // else, if we have a view, above if above.
00351     else if (anOrderingMode === CPWindowAbove)
00352         ++index;
00353         
00354     [self _insertSubview:aSubview atIndex:index];
00355 }
00356 
00357 /* @ignore */
00358 - (void)_insertSubview:(CPView)aSubview atIndex:(int)anIndex
00359 {
00360     // We will have to adjust the z-index of all views starting at this index.
00361     var count = _subviews.length;
00362 
00363     // dirty the key view loop, in case the window wants to auto recalculate it
00364     [[self window] _dirtyKeyViewLoop];
00365 
00366     // If this is already one of our subviews, remove it.
00367     if (aSubview._superview == self)
00368     {
00369         var index = [_subviews indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:aSubview];
00370         
00371         // FIXME: should this be anIndex >= count? (last one)
00372         if (index === anIndex || index === count - 1 && anIndex === count)
00373             return;
00374         
00375         [_subviews removeObjectAtIndex:index];
00376         
00377 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00378         CPDOMDisplayServerRemoveChild(_DOMElement, aSubview._DOMElement);
00379 #endif
00380 
00381         if (anIndex > index)
00382             --anIndex;
00383         
00384         //We've effectively made the subviews array shorter, so represent that.
00385         --count;
00386     }
00387     else
00388     {
00389         // Remove the view from its previous superview.
00390         [aSubview removeFromSuperview];
00391 
00392         // Set the subview's window to our own. 
00393         [aSubview _setWindow:_window];
00394 
00395         // Notify the subview that it will be moving.
00396         [aSubview viewWillMoveToSuperview:self];
00397     
00398         // Set ourselves as the superview.
00399         aSubview._superview = self;
00400     }
00401     
00402     if (anIndex === CPNotFound || anIndex >= count)
00403     {
00404         _subviews.push(aSubview);
00405 
00406 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00407         // Attach the actual node.
00408         CPDOMDisplayServerAppendChild(_DOMElement, aSubview._DOMElement);
00409 #endif
00410     }
00411     else
00412     {
00413         _subviews.splice(anIndex, 0, aSubview);
00414     
00415 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00416         // Attach the actual node.
00417         CPDOMDisplayServerInsertBefore(_DOMElement, aSubview._DOMElement, _subviews[anIndex + 1]._DOMElement);
00418 #endif
00419     }
00420     
00421     [aSubview setNextResponder:self];
00422     [aSubview viewDidMoveToSuperview];
00423     
00424     [self didAddSubview:aSubview];
00425 }
00426 
00431 - (void)didAddSubview:(CPView)aSubview

00433 }

00439 - (void)removeFromSuperview
00440 {
00441     if (!_superview)
00442         return;
00443 
00444     // dirty the key view loop, in case the window wants to auto recalculate it
00445     [[self window] _dirtyKeyViewLoop];
00446 
00447     [_superview willRemoveSubview:self];
00448     
00449     [_superview._subviews removeObject:self];
00450 
00451 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00452         CPDOMDisplayServerRemoveChild(_superview._DOMElement, _DOMElement);
00453 #endif
00454     _superview = nil;
00455     
00456     [self _setWindow:nil];
00457 }
00458 
00464 - (void)replaceSubview:(CPView)aSubview with:(CPView)aView
00465 {
00466     if (aSubview._superview != self)
00467         return;
00468     
00469     var index = [_subviews indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:aSubview];
00470     
00471     [aSubview removeFromSuperview];
00472     
00473     [self _insertSubview:aView atIndex:index];
00474 }
00475 
00476 - (void)setSubviews:(CPArray)newSubviews
00477 {
00478     if (!newSubviews)
00479         [CPException raise:CPInvalidArgumentException reason:"newSubviews cannot be nil in -[CPView setSubviews:]"];
00480 
00481     // Trivial Case 0: Same array somehow
00482     if ([_subviews isEqual:newSubviews])
00483         return;
00484 
00485     // Trivial Case 1: No current subviews, simply add all new subviews.
00486     if ([_subviews count] === 0)
00487     {
00488         var index = 0,
00489             count = [newSubviews count];
00490 
00491         for (; index < count; ++index)
00492             [self addSubview:newSubviews[index]];
00493 
00494         return;
00495     }
00496 
00497     // Trivial Case 2: No new subviews, simply remove all current subviews.
00498     if ([newSubviews count] === 0)
00499     {
00500         var count = [_subviews count];
00501 
00502         while (count--)
00503             [_subviews[count] removeFromSuperview];
00504 
00505         return;
00506     }
00507 
00508     // Find out the views that were removed.
00509     var removedSubviews = [CPMutableSet setWithArray:_subviews];
00510 
00511     [removedSubviews removeObjectsInArray:newSubviews];
00512     [removedSubviews makeObjectsPerformSelector:@selector(removeFromSuperview)];
00513 
00514     // Find out which views need to be added.
00515     var addedSubviews = [CPMutableSet setWithArray:newSubviews];
00516 
00517     [addedSubviews removeObjectsInArray:_subviews];
00518 
00519     var addedSubview = nil,
00520         addedSubviewEnumerator = [addedSubviews objectEnumerator];
00521 
00522     while (addedSubview = [addedSubviewEnumerator nextObject])
00523         [self addSubview:addedSubview];
00524 
00525     // If the order is fine, no need to reorder.
00526     if ([_subviews isEqual:newSubviews])
00527         return;
00528 
00529     _subviews = [newSubviews copy];
00530 
00531     var index = 0,
00532         count = [_subviews count];
00533 
00534     for (; index < count; ++index)
00535     {
00536         var subview = _subviews[index];
00537 
00538         CPDOMDisplayServerRemoveChild(_DOMElement, subview._DOMElement);
00539         CPDOMDisplayServerAppendChild(_DOMElement, subview._DOMElement);
00540     }
00541 }
00542 
00543 /* @ignore */
00544 - (void)_setWindow:(CPWindow)aWindow
00545 {
00546     if (_window === aWindow)
00547         return;
00548     
00549     [[self window] _dirtyKeyViewLoop];
00550 
00551     // Clear out first responder if we're the first responder and leaving.
00552     if ([_window firstResponder] === self)
00553         [_window makeFirstResponder:nil];
00554 
00555     // Notify the view and its subviews
00556     [self viewWillMoveToWindow:aWindow];
00557 
00558     // Unregister the drag events from the current window and register
00559     // them in the new window.
00560     if (_registeredDraggedTypes)
00561     {
00562         [_window _noteUnregisteredDraggedTypes:_registeredDraggedTypes];
00563         [aWindow _noteRegisteredDraggedTypes:_registeredDraggedTypes];
00564     }
00565 
00566     _window = aWindow;
00567 
00568     var count = [_subviews count];
00569 
00570     while (count--)
00571         [_subviews[count] _setWindow:aWindow];
00572     
00573     [self viewDidMoveToWindow];
00574 
00575     [[self window] _dirtyKeyViewLoop];
00576 }

00582 - (BOOL)isDescendantOf:(CPView)aView
00583 {
00584     var view = self;
00585     
00586     do
00587     {
00588         if (view == aView)
00589             return YES;
00590     } while(view = [view superview])
00591     
00592     return NO;
00593 }

00639 - (CPMenuItem)enclosingMenuItem
00640 {
00641     var view = self;
00642     
00643     while (view && ![view isKindOfClass:[_CPMenuItemView class]])
00644         view = [view superview];
00645     
00646     if (view)
00647         return view._menuItem;
00648     
00649     return nil;
00650 /*    var view = self,
00651         enclosingMenuItem = _enclosingMenuItem;
00652     
00653     while (!enclosingMenuItem && (view = view._enclosingMenuItem))
00654         view = [view superview];
00655     
00656     return enclosingMenuItem;*/

00669 - (void)viewWithTag:(CPInteger)aTag
00670 {
00671     if ([self tag] == aTag)
00672         return self;
00673 
00674     var index = 0,
00675         count = _subviews.length;
00676 
00677     for (; index < count; ++index)
00678     {
00679         var view = [_subviews[index] viewWithTag:aTag];
00680 
00681         if (view)
00682             return view;
00683     }
00684 
00685     return nil;
00686 }

00704 - (void)setFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00705 {
00706     if (_CGRectEqualToRect(_frame, aFrame))
00707         return;
00708         
00709     _inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications = YES;
00710     
00711     [self setFrameOrigin:aFrame.origin];
00712     [self setFrameSize:aFrame.size];
00713 
00714     _inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications = NO;
00715 
00716     if (_postsFrameChangedNotifications)
00717         [CachedNotificationCenter postNotificationName:CPViewFrameDidChangeNotification object:self];
00718 }

00746 - (void)setCenter:(CGPoint)aPoint

00767 - (void)setFrameOrigin:(CGPoint)aPoint
00768 {
00769     var origin = _frame.origin;
00770     
00771     if (!aPoint || _CGPointEqualToPoint(origin, aPoint))
00772         return;
00773 
00774     origin.x = aPoint.x;
00775     origin.y = aPoint.y;
00776 
00777     if (_postsFrameChangedNotifications && !_inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications)
00778         [CachedNotificationCenter postNotificationName:CPViewFrameDidChangeNotification object:self];
00779 
00780 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00781     var transform = _superview ? _superview._boundsTransform : NULL;
00782 
00783     CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMElement, transform, origin.x, origin.y);
00784 #endif
00785 }
00786 
00793 - (void)setFrameSize:(CGSize)aSize
00794 {
00795     var size = _frame.size;
00796     
00797     if (!aSize || _CGSizeEqualToSize(size, aSize))
00798         return;
00799 
00800     var oldSize = _CGSizeMakeCopy(size);
00801 
00802     size.width = aSize.width;
00803     size.height = aSize.height;
00804 
00805     if (YES)
00806     {
00807         _bounds.size.width = aSize.width;
00808         _bounds.size.height = aSize.height;
00809     }
00810 
00811     if (_layer)
00812         [_layer _owningViewBoundsChanged];
00813 
00814     if (_autoresizesSubviews)
00815         [self resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:oldSize];
00816     
00817     [self setNeedsLayout];
00818     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00819 
00820 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00821     CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMElement, size.width, size.height);
00822 
00823     if (_DOMContentsElement)
00824     {
00825         CPDOMDisplayServerSetSize(_DOMContentsElement, size.width, size.height);
00826         CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMContentsElement, size.width, size.height);
00827     }
00828 
00829     if (_backgroundType !== BackgroundTrivialColor)
00830     {
00831         var images = [[_backgroundColor patternImage] imageSlices];
00832 
00833         if (_backgroundType === BackgroundVerticalThreePartImage)
00834         {
00835             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[1], size.width, size.height - _DOMImageSizes[0].height - _DOMImageSizes[2].height);
00836         }
00837 
00838         else if (_backgroundType === BackgroundHorizontalThreePartImage)
00839         {
00840             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[1], size.width - _DOMImageSizes[0].width - _DOMImageSizes[2].width, size.height);
00841         }
00842 
00843         else if (_backgroundType === BackgroundNinePartImage)
00844         {
00845             var width = size.width - _DOMImageSizes[0].width - _DOMImageSizes[2].width,
00846                 height = size.height - _DOMImageSizes[0].height - _DOMImageSizes[6].height;
00847 
00848             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[1], width, _DOMImageSizes[0].height);
00849             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[3], _DOMImageSizes[3].width, height);
00850             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[4], width, height);
00851             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[5], _DOMImageSizes[5].width, height);
00852             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[7], width, _DOMImageSizes[7].height);
00853         }
00854     }
00855 #endif
00856 
00857     if (_postsFrameChangedNotifications && !_inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications)
00858         [CachedNotificationCenter postNotificationName:CPViewFrameDidChangeNotification object:self];
00859 }
00860 
00866 - (void)setBounds:(CGRect)bounds
00867 {
00868     if (_CGRectEqualToRect(_bounds, bounds))
00869         return;
00870         
00871     _inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications = YES;
00872     
00873     [self setBoundsOrigin:bounds.origin];
00874     [self setBoundsSize:bounds.size];
00875 
00876     _inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications = NO;
00877 
00878     if (_postsBoundsChangedNotifications)
00879         [CachedNotificationCenter postNotificationName:CPViewBoundsDidChangeNotification object:self];
00880 }
00881 
00886 - (CGRect)bounds
00887 {
00888     return _CGRectMakeCopy(_bounds);
00889 }
00890 
00891 - (CGPoint)boundsOrigin
00892 {
00893     return _CGPointMakeCopy(_bounds.origin);
00894 }
00895 
00896 - (CGSize)boundsSize
00897 {
00898     return _CGSizeMakeCopy(_bounds.size);
00899 }
00900 
00907 - (void)setBoundsOrigin:(CGPoint)aPoint
00908 {
00909     var origin = _bounds.origin;
00910     
00911     if (_CGPointEqualToPoint(origin, aPoint))
00912         return;
00913         
00914     origin.x = aPoint.x;
00915     origin.y = aPoint.y;
00916     
00917     if (origin.x != 0 || origin.y != 0)
00918     {
00919         _boundsTransform = _CGAffineTransformMakeTranslation(-origin.x, -origin.y);
00920         _inverseBoundsTransform = CGAffineTransformInvert(_boundsTransform);
00921     }
00922     else
00923     {
00924         _boundsTransform = nil;
00925         _inverseBoundsTransform = nil;
00926     }
00927     
00928 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00929     var index = _subviews.length;
00930     
00931     while (index--)
00932     {
00933         var view = _subviews[index],
00934             origin = view._frame.origin;
00935         
00936         CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(view._DOMElement, _boundsTransform, origin.x, origin.y);
00937     }
00938 #endif
00939     
00940     if (_postsBoundsChangedNotifications && !_inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications)
00941         [CachedNotificationCenter postNotificationName:CPViewBoundsDidChangeNotification object:self];
00942 }
00943 
00950 - (void)setBoundsSize:(CGSize)aSize
00951 {
00952     var size = _bounds.size;
00953     
00954     if (_CGSizeEqualToSize(size, aSize))
00955         return;
00956 
00957     var frameSize = _frame.size;
00958 
00959     if (!_CGSizeEqualToSize(size, frameSize))
00960     {
00961         var origin = _bounds.origin;
00962         
00963         origin.x /= size.width / frameSize.width;
00964         origin.y /= size.height / frameSize.height;
00965     }
00966     
00967     size.width = aSize.width;
00968     size.height = aSize.height;
00969     
00970     if (!_CGSizeEqualToSize(size, frameSize))
00971     {
00972         var origin = _bounds.origin;
00973         
00974         origin.x *= size.width / frameSize.width;
00975         origin.y *= size.height / frameSize.height;
00976     }
00977     
00978     if (_postsBoundsChangedNotifications && !_inhibitFrameAndBoundsChangedNotifications)
00979         [CachedNotificationCenter postNotificationName:CPViewBoundsDidChangeNotification object:self];
00980 }
00981 
00982 
00987 - (void)resizeWithOldSuperviewSize:(CGSize)aSize
00988 {
00989     var mask = [self autoresizingMask];
00990     
00991     if(mask == CPViewNotSizable)
00992         return;
00993 
00994     var frame = _superview._frame,
00995         newFrame = _CGRectMakeCopy(_frame),
00996         dX = (_CGRectGetWidth(frame) - aSize.width) /
00997             (((mask & CPViewMinXMargin) ? 1 : 0) + (mask & CPViewWidthSizable ? 1 : 0) + (mask & CPViewMaxXMargin ? 1 : 0)),
00998         dY = (_CGRectGetHeight(frame) - aSize.height) /
00999             ((mask & CPViewMinYMargin ? 1 : 0) + (mask & CPViewHeightSizable ? 1 : 0) + (mask & CPViewMaxYMargin ? 1 : 0));
01000 
01001     if (mask & CPViewMinXMargin)
01002         newFrame.origin.x += dX;
01003     if (mask & CPViewWidthSizable)
01004         newFrame.size.width += dX;
01005     
01006     if (mask & CPViewMinYMargin)
01007         newFrame.origin.y += dY;
01008     if (mask & CPViewHeightSizable)
01009         newFrame.size.height += dY;
01010 
01011     [self setFrame:newFrame];
01012 }
01013 
01018 - (void)resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:(CGSize)aSize
01019 {
01020     var count = _subviews.length;
01021     
01022     while (count--)
01023         [_subviews[count] resizeWithOldSuperviewSize:aSize];
01024 }

01064 // Fullscreen Mode
01065 
01069 - (BOOL)enterFullScreenMode
01070 {
01071     return [self enterFullScreenMode:nil withOptions:nil];
01072 }
01073 
01079 - (BOOL)enterFullScreenMode:(CPScreen)aScreen withOptions:(CPDictionary)options
01080 {
01081     _fullScreenModeState = _CPViewFullScreenModeStateMake(self);
01082     
01083     var fullScreenWindow = [[CPWindow alloc] initWithContentRect:[[CPPlatformWindow primaryPlatformWindow] contentBounds] styleMask:CPBorderlessWindowMask];
01084     
01085     [fullScreenWindow setLevel:CPScreenSaverWindowLevel];
01086     [fullScreenWindow setAutoresizingMask:CPViewWidthSizable | CPViewHeightSizable];
01087     
01088     var contentView = [fullScreenWindow contentView];
01089     
01090     [contentView setBackgroundColor:[CPColor blackColor]];
01091     [contentView addSubview:self];
01092 
01093     [self setAutoresizingMask:CPViewWidthSizable | CPViewHeightSizable];
01094     [self setFrame:CGRectMakeCopy([contentView bounds])];
01095 
01096     [fullScreenWindow makeKeyAndOrderFront:self];
01097     
01098     [fullScreenWindow makeFirstResponder:self];
01099     
01100     _isInFullScreenMode = YES;
01101     
01102     return YES;
01103 }
01104 
01108 - (void)exitFullScreenMode
01109 {
01110     [self exitFullScreenModeWithOptions:nil];
01111 }
01112 
01117 - (void)exitFullScreenModeWithOptions:(CPDictionary)options
01118 {
01119     if (!_isInFullScreenMode)
01120         return;
01121 
01122     _isInFullScreenMode = NO;
01123 
01124     [self setFrame:_fullScreenModeState.frame];
01125     [self setAutoresizingMask:_fullScreenModeState.autoresizingMask];
01126     [_fullScreenModeState.superview _insertSubview:self atIndex:_fullScreenModeState.index];
01127     
01128     [[self window] orderOut:self];
01129 }
01130 
01134 - (BOOL)isInFullScreenMode
01135 {
01136     return _isInFullScreenMode;
01137 }
01138 
01143 - (void)setHidden:(BOOL)aFlag
01144 {
01145     aFlag = !!aFlag;
01146 
01147     if(_isHidden === aFlag)
01148         return;
01149 
01150 //  FIXME: Should we return to visibility?  This breaks in FireFox, Opera, and IE.
01151 //    _DOMElement.style.visibility = (_isHidden = aFlag) ? "hidden" : "visible";
01152     _isHidden = aFlag;
01153 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
01154     _DOMElement.style.display = _isHidden ? "none" : "block";
01155 #endif
01156 
01157     if (aFlag)
01158     {
01159         var view = [_window firstResponder];
01160 
01161         if ([view isKindOfClass:[CPView class]])
01162         {
01163             do 
01164             {
01165                if (self == view)
01166                {
01167                   [_window makeFirstResponder:[self nextValidKeyView]];
01168                   break;
01169                }   
01170             } 
01171             while (view = [view superview]);
01172         }
01173     }
01174 }
01175 
01179 - (BOOL)isHidden
01180 {
01181     return _isHidden;
01182 }
01183 
01189 - (void)setAlphaValue:(float)anAlphaValue
01190 {
01191     if (_opacity == anAlphaValue)
01192         return;
01193     
01194     _opacity = anAlphaValue;
01195     
01196 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
01197     
01198     if (CPFeatureIsCompatible(CPOpacityRequiresFilterFeature))
01199     {
01200         if (anAlphaValue == 1.0)
01201             try { _DOMElement.style.removeAttribute("filter") } catch (anException) { }
01202         else
01203             _DOMElement.style.filter = "alpha(opacity=" + anAlphaValue * 100 + ")";
01204     }
01205     else
01206         _DOMElement.style.opacity = anAlphaValue;
01207 
01208 #endif
01209 }
01210 
01215 - (float)alphaValue
01216 {
01217     return _opacity;
01218 }

01224 - (BOOL)isHiddenOrHasHiddenAncestor
01225 {
01226     var view = self;
01227     
01228     while (view && ![view isHidden])
01229         view = [view superview];
01230     
01231     return view !== nil;
01232 }

01258 - (void)setHitTests:(BOOL)shouldHitTest
01259 {
01260     _hitTests = !!shouldHitTest;
01261 }
01262 
01268 - (CPView)hitTest:(CPPoint)aPoint
01269 {
01270     if(_isHidden || !_hitTests || !CPRectContainsPoint(_frame, aPoint))
01271         return nil;
01272     
01273     var view = nil,
01274         i = _subviews.length,
01275         adjustedPoint = _CGPointMake(aPoint.x - _CGRectGetMinX(_frame), aPoint.y - _CGRectGetMinY(_frame));
01276 
01277     if (_inverseBoundsTransform)
01278         adjustedPoint = _CGPointApplyAffineTransform(adjustedPoint, _inverseBoundsTransform);
01279 
01280     while (i--)
01281         if (view = [_subviews[i] hitTest:adjustedPoint])
01282             return view;
01283 
01284     return self;
01285 }

01309 
01314 - (void)setBackgroundColor:(CPColor)aColor
01315 {
01316     if (_backgroundColor == aColor)
01317         return;
01318     
01319     _backgroundColor = aColor;
01320     
01321 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
01322     var patternImage = [_backgroundColor patternImage],
01323         amount = 0;
01324     
01325     if ([patternImage isThreePartImage])
01326     {
01327         _backgroundType = [patternImage isVertical] ? BackgroundVerticalThreePartImage : BackgroundHorizontalThreePartImage;
01328         
01329         amount = 3 - _DOMImageParts.length;
01330     }
01331     else if ([patternImage isNinePartImage])
01332     {
01333         _backgroundType = BackgroundNinePartImage;
01334         
01335         amount = 9 - _DOMImageParts.length;   
01336     }
01337     else
01338     {
01339         _backgroundType = BackgroundTrivialColor;
01340 
01341         amount = 0 - _DOMImageParts.length;
01342     }
01343 
01344     if (amount > 0)
01345         while (amount--)
01346         {
01347             var DOMElement = DOMElementPrototype.cloneNode(false);
01348             
01349             DOMElement.style.zIndex = -1000;
01350             
01351             _DOMImageParts.push(DOMElement);
01352             _DOMElement.appendChild(DOMElement);
01353         }
01354     else
01355     {
01356         amount = -amount;
01357         
01358         while (amount--)
01359             _DOMElement.removeChild(_DOMImageParts.pop());
01360     }
01361     
01362     if (_backgroundType == BackgroundTrivialColor)
01363     
01364         // Opera doesn't like DOM properties set to nil.
01365         // https://trac.280north.com/ticket/7
01366         _DOMElement.style.background = _backgroundColor ? [_backgroundColor cssString] : "";
01367     
01368     else
01369     {
01370         var slices = [patternImage imageSlices],
01371             count = MIN(_DOMImageParts.length, slices.length),
01372             frameSize = _frame.size;
01373 
01374         while (count--)
01375         {
01376             var image = slices[count],
01377                 size = _DOMImageSizes[count] = image ? [image size] : _CGSizeMakeZero();
01378             
01379             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[count], size.width, size.height);
01380 
01381             _DOMImageParts[count].style.background = image ? "url(\"" + [image filename] + "\")" : "";
01382         }
01383         
01384         if (_backgroundType == BackgroundNinePartImage)
01385         {
01386             var width = frameSize.width - _DOMImageSizes[0].width - _DOMImageSizes[2].width,
01387                 height = frameSize.height - _DOMImageSizes[0].height - _DOMImageSizes[6].height;
01388             
01389             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[1], width, _DOMImageSizes[0].height);
01390             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[3], _DOMImageSizes[3].width, height);
01391             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[4], width, height);
01392             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[5], _DOMImageSizes[5].width, height);
01393             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[7], width, _DOMImageSizes[7].height);
01394                 
01395             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[0], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);            
01396             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[1], NULL, _DOMImageSizes[0].width, 0.0);
01397             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleRightTop(_DOMImageParts[2], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);
01398             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[3], NULL, 0.0, _DOMImageSizes[1].height);
01399             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[4], NULL, _DOMImageSizes[0].width, _DOMImageSizes[0].height);
01400             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleRightTop(_DOMImageParts[5], NULL, 0.0, _DOMImageSizes[1].height);
01401             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftBottom(_DOMImageParts[6], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);
01402             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftBottom(_DOMImageParts[7], NULL, _DOMImageSizes[6].width, 0.0);
01403             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleRightBottom(_DOMImageParts[8], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);      
01404         }
01405         else if (_backgroundType == BackgroundVerticalThreePartImage)
01406         {    
01407             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[1], frameSize.width, frameSize.height - _DOMImageSizes[0].height - _DOMImageSizes[2].height);
01408             
01409             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[0], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);
01410             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[1], NULL, 0.0, _DOMImageSizes[0].height);        
01411             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftBottom(_DOMImageParts[2], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);
01412         }
01413         else if (_backgroundType == BackgroundHorizontalThreePartImage)
01414         {
01415             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMImageParts[1], frameSize.width - _DOMImageSizes[0].width - _DOMImageSizes[2].width, frameSize.height);
01416         
01417             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[0], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);
01418             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMImageParts[1], NULL, _DOMImageSizes[0].width, 0.0);        
01419             CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleRightTop(_DOMImageParts[2], NULL, 0.0, 0.0);
01420         }
01421     }
01422 #endif
01423 }
01424

01602 - (void)registerForDraggedTypes:(CPArray)pasteboardTypes
01603 {
01604     if (!pasteboardTypes || ![pasteboardTypes count])
01605         return;
01606 
01607     var theWindow = [self window];
01608 
01609     [theWindow _noteUnregisteredDraggedTypes:_registeredDraggedTypes];
01610     [_registeredDraggedTypes addObjectsFromArray:pasteboardTypes]
01611     [theWindow _noteRegisteredDraggedTypes:_registeredDraggedTypes];
01612 
01613     _registeredDraggedTypesArray = nil;
01614 }
01615

01626 }

01653 - (void)setNeedsDisplay:(BOOL)aFlag

01663 - (void)setNeedsDisplayInRect:(CPRect)aRect
01664 {
01665     if (!(_viewClassFlags & CPViewHasCustomDrawRect))
01666         return;
01667 
01668     if (_CGRectIsEmpty(aRect))
01669         return;
01670 
01671     if (_dirtyRect && !_CGRectIsEmpty(_dirtyRect))
01672         _dirtyRect = CGRectUnion(aRect, _dirtyRect);
01673     else
01674         _dirtyRect = _CGRectMakeCopy(aRect);
01675 
01676     _CPDisplayServerAddDisplayObject(self);
01677 }
01678 
01679 - (BOOL)needsDisplay
01680 {
01681     return _dirtyRect && !_CGRectIsEmpty(_dirtyRect);
01682 }
01683 
01687 - (void)displayIfNeeded
01688 {
01689     if ([self needsDisplay])
01690         [self displayRect:_dirtyRect];
01691 }

01697 {
01698     [self displayRect:[self visibleRect]];
01699 }

01704         [self displayRect:aRect];

01711 - (void)displayRect:(CPRect)aRect
01712 {
01713     [self viewWillDraw];
01714     
01715     [self displayRectIgnoringOpacity:aRect inContext:nil];
01716     
01717     _dirtyRect = NULL;
01718 }
01719 
01720 - (void)displayRectIgnoringOpacity:(CGRect)aRect inContext:(CPGraphicsContext)aGraphicsContext
01721 {
01722     [self lockFocus];
01723     
01724     CGContextClearRect([[CPGraphicsContext currentContext] graphicsPort], aRect);
01725     
01726     [self drawRect:aRect];
01727     [self unlockFocus];
01728 }
01729 
01730 - (void)viewWillDraw
01731 {
01732 }
01733 
01737 - (void)lockFocus
01738 {
01739     if (!_graphicsContext)
01740     {
01741         var graphicsPort = CGBitmapGraphicsContextCreate();
01742         
01743         _DOMContentsElement = graphicsPort.DOMElement;
01744         
01745         _DOMContentsElement.style.zIndex = -100;
01746 
01747         _DOMContentsElement.style.overflow = "hidden";
01748         _DOMContentsElement.style.position = "absolute";
01749         _DOMContentsElement.style.visibility = "visible";
01750         
01751         _DOMContentsElement.width = ROUND(_CGRectGetWidth(_frame));
01752         _DOMContentsElement.height = ROUND(_CGRectGetHeight(_frame));
01753         
01754         _DOMContentsElement.style.top = "0px";
01755         _DOMContentsElement.style.left = "0px";
01756         _DOMContentsElement.style.width = ROUND(_CGRectGetWidth(_frame)) + "px";
01757         _DOMContentsElement.style.height = ROUND(_CGRectGetHeight(_frame)) + "px";
01758 
01759         CPDOMDisplayServerAppendChild(_DOMElement, _DOMContentsElement);
01760         
01761         _graphicsContext = [CPGraphicsContext graphicsContextWithGraphicsPort:graphicsPort flipped:YES];
01762     }
01763     
01764     [CPGraphicsContext setCurrentContext:_graphicsContext];
01765     
01766     CGContextSaveGState([_graphicsContext graphicsPort]);
01767 }
01768 
01772 - (void)unlockFocus
01773 {
01774     CGContextRestoreGState([_graphicsContext graphicsPort]);
01775     
01776     [CPGraphicsContext setCurrentContext:nil];
01777 }
01778

01781     if (!(_viewClassFlags & CPViewHasCustomLayoutSubviews))
01782         return;
01783

01785 
01786     _CPDisplayServerAddLayoutObject(self);
01787 }

01814 - (CGRect)visibleRect
01815 {
01816     if (!_superview)
01817         return _bounds;
01818     
01819     return CGRectIntersection([self convertRect:[_superview visibleRect] fromView:_superview], _bounds);
01820 }

01822 // Scrolling
01823 /* @ignore */
01824 - (CPScrollView)_enclosingClipView
01825 {
01826     var superview = _superview,
01827         clipViewClass = [CPClipView class];
01828 
01829     while(superview && ![superview isKindOfClass:clipViewClass]) 
01830         superview = superview._superview;
01831 
01832     return superview;
01833 }
01834 
01839 - (void)scrollPoint:(CGPoint)aPoint
01840 {
01841     var clipView = [self _enclosingClipView];
01842     
01843     if (!clipView)
01844         return;
01845     
01846     [clipView scrollToPoint:[self convertPoint:aPoint toView:clipView]];
01847 }
01848 
01854 - (BOOL)scrollRectToVisible:(CGRect)aRect
01855 {
01856     var visibleRect = [self visibleRect];
01857     
01858     // Make sure we have a rect that exists.
01859     aRect = CGRectIntersection(aRect, _bounds);
01860     
01861     // If aRect is empty or is already visible then no scrolling required.
01862     if (_CGRectIsEmpty(aRect) || CGRectContainsRect(visibleRect, aRect))
01863         return NO;
01864 
01865     var enclosingClipView = [self _enclosingClipView];
01866     
01867     // If we're not in a clip view, then there isn't much we can do.
01868     if (!enclosingClipView)
01869         return NO;
01870     
01871     var scrollPoint = _CGPointMakeCopy(visibleRect.origin);
01872             
01873     // One of the following has to be true since our current visible rect didn't contain aRect.
01874     if (_CGRectGetMinX(aRect) <= _CGRectGetMinX(visibleRect))
01875         scrollPoint.x = _CGRectGetMinX(aRect);
01876     else if (_CGRectGetMaxX(aRect) > _CGRectGetMaxX(visibleRect))
01877         scrollPoint.x += _CGRectGetMaxX(aRect) - _CGRectGetMaxX(visibleRect);
01878     
01879     if (_CGRectGetMinY(aRect) <= _CGRectGetMinY(visibleRect))
01880         scrollPoint.y = CGRectGetMinY(aRect);
01881     else if (_CGRectGetMaxY(aRect) > _CGRectGetMaxY(visibleRect))
01882         scrollPoint.y += _CGRectGetMaxY(aRect) - _CGRectGetMaxY(visibleRect);
01883     
01884     [enclosingClipView scrollToPoint:CGPointMake(scrollPoint.x, scrollPoint.y)];
01885     
01886     return YES;
01887 }
01888 
01889 /*
01890     FIXME Not yet implemented
01891 */
01892 - (BOOL)autoscroll:(CPEvent)anEvent
01893 {
01894     return [[self superview] autoscroll:anEvent];
01895 }

01920 - (CPScrollView)enclosingScrollView
01921 {
01922     var superview = _superview,
01923         scrollViewClass = [CPScrollView class];

01926         superview = superview._superview;
01927

01929 }

01952 @implementation CPView (KeyView)
01953 
01954 - (BOOL)performKeyEquivalent:(CPEvent)anEvent
01955 {
01956     var count = [_subviews count];
01957 
01958     // Is reverse iteration correct here? It matches the other (correct) code like hit testing.
01959     while (count--)
01960         if ([_subviews[count] performKeyEquivalent:anEvent])
01961             return YES;
01962 
01963     return NO;
01964 }

01966 - (BOOL)canBecomeKeyView

02019 - (void)setLayer:(CALayer)aLayer
02020 {
02021     if (_layer == aLayer)
02022         return;
02023     
02024     if (_layer)
02025     {
02026         _layer._owningView = nil;
02027 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
02028         _DOMElement.removeChild(_layer._DOMElement);
02029 #endif
02030     }
02031     
02032     _layer = aLayer;
02033     
02034     if (_layer)
02035     {
02036         var bounds = CGRectMakeCopy([self bounds]);
02037         
02038         [_layer _setOwningView:self];
02039         
02040 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
02041         _layer._DOMElement.style.zIndex = 100;
02042         
02043         _DOMElement.appendChild(_layer._DOMElement);
02044 #endif
02045     }
02046 }

02076 @implementation CPView (Theming)
02077 #pragma mark Theme States
02078 
02079 - (unsigned)themeState
02080 {
02081     return _themeState;
02082 }
02083 
02084 - (BOOL)hasThemeState:(CPThemeState)aState
02085 {
02086     return !!(_themeState & ((typeof aState === "string") ? CPThemeState(aState) : aState));
02087 }
02088 
02089 - (BOOL)setThemeState:(CPThemeState)aState
02090 {
02091     var newState = (typeof aState === "string") ? CPThemeState(aState) : aState;
02092 
02093     if (_themeState & newState)
02094         return NO;
02095 
02096     _themeState |= newState;
02097 
02098     [self setNeedsLayout];
02099     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
02100 
02101     return YES;
02102 }
02103 
02104 - (BOOL)unsetThemeState:(CPThemeState)aState
02105 {
02106     var newState = ((typeof aState === "string") ? CPThemeState(aState) : aState);
02107 
02108     if (!(_themeState & newState))
02109         return NO;
02110 
02111     _themeState &= ~newState;
02112 
02113     [self setNeedsLayout];
02114     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
02115 
02116     return YES;
02117 }
02118 
02119 #pragma mark Theme Attributes
02120 
02121 + (CPString)themeClass
02122 {
02123     return nil;
02124 }
02125 
02126 + (CPDictionary)themeAttributes
02127 {
02128     return nil;
02129 }
02130 
02131 + (CPArray)_themeAttributes
02132 {
02133     if (!CachedThemeAttributes)
02134         CachedThemeAttributes = {};
02135 
02136     var theClass = [self class],
02137         CPViewClass = [CPView class],
02138         attributes = [];
02139 
02140     for (; theClass && theClass !== CPViewClass; theClass = [theClass superclass])
02141     {
02142         var cachedAttributes = CachedThemeAttributes[class_getName(theClass)];
02143 
02144         if (cachedAttributes)
02145         {
02146             attributes = attributes.length ? attributes.concat(cachedAttributes) : attributes;
02147             CachedThemeAttributes[[self className]] = attributes;
02148 
02149             break;
02150         }
02151 
02152         var attributeDictionary = [theClass themeAttributes];
02153         
02154         if (!attributeDictionary)
02155             continue;
02156 
02157         var attributeKeys = [attributeDictionary allKeys],
02158             attributeCount = attributeKeys.length;
02159 
02160         while (attributeCount--)
02161         {
02162             var attributeName = attributeKeys[attributeCount];
02163 
02164             attributes.push([attributeDictionary objectForKey:attributeName]);
02165             attributes.push(attributeName);
02166         }
02167     }
02168 
02169     return attributes;
02170 }
02171 
02172 - (void)_loadThemeAttributes
02173 {
02174     var theClass = [self class],
02175         attributes = [theClass _themeAttributes],
02176         count = attributes.length;
02177 
02178     if (!count)
02179         return;
02180 
02181     var theme = [self theme],
02182         themeClass = [theClass themeClass];
02183 
02184     _themeAttributes = {};
02185     
02186     while (count--)
02187     {
02188         var attributeName = attributes[count--],
02189             attribute = [[_CPThemeAttribute alloc] initWithName:attributeName defaultValue:attributes[count]];
02190 
02191         [attribute setParentAttribute:[theme _attributeWithName:attributeName forClass:themeClass]];
02192         
02193         _themeAttributes[attributeName] = attribute;
02194     }
02195 }
02196 
02197 - (void)setTheme:(CPTheme)aTheme
02198 {
02199     if (_theme === aTheme)
02200         return;
02201     
02202     _theme = aTheme;
02203         
02204     [self viewDidChangeTheme];
02205 }
02206 
02207 - (CPTheme)theme
02208 {
02209     return _theme;
02210 }
02211 
02212 - (void)viewDidChangeTheme
02213 {
02214     if (!_themeAttributes)
02215         return;
02216 
02217     var theme = [self theme],
02218         themeClass = [[self class] themeClass];
02219 
02220     for (var attributeName in _themeAttributes)
02221         if (_themeAttributes.hasOwnProperty(attributeName))
02222             [_themeAttributes[attributeName] setParentAttribute:[theme _attributeWithName:attributeName forClass:themeClass]];
02223 
02224     [self setNeedsLayout];
02225     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
02226 }
02227 
02228 - (CPDictionary)_themeAttributeDictionary
02229 {
02230     var dictionary = [CPDictionary dictionary];
02231 
02232     if (_themeAttributes)
02233     {
02234         var theme = [self theme];
02235 
02236         for (var attributeName in _themeAttributes)
02237             if (_themeAttributes.hasOwnProperty(attributeName))
02238                 [dictionary setObject:_themeAttributes[attributeName] forKey:attributeName];
02239     }
02240 
02241     return dictionary;
02242 }
02243 
02244 - (void)setValue:(id)aValue forThemeAttribute:(CPString)aName inState:(CPThemeState)aState
02245 {
02246     if (!_themeAttributes || !_themeAttributes[aName])
02247         [CPException raise:CPInvalidArgumentException reason:[self className] + " does not contain theme attribute '" + aName + "'"];
02248 
02249     var currentValue = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:aName];
02250 
02251     [_themeAttributes[aName] setValue:aValue forState:aState];
02252 
02253     if ([self currentValueForThemeAttribute:aName] === currentValue)
02254         return;
02255 
02256     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
02257     [self setNeedsLayout];
02258 }
02259 
02260 - (void)setValue:(id)aValue forThemeAttribute:(CPString)aName
02261 {
02262     if (!_themeAttributes || !_themeAttributes[aName])
02263         [CPException raise:CPInvalidArgumentException reason:[self className] + " does not contain theme attribute '" + aName + "'"];
02264 
02265     var currentValue = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:aName];
02266 
02267     [_themeAttributes[aName] setValue:aValue];
02268 
02269     if ([self currentValueForThemeAttribute:aName] === currentValue)
02270         return;
02271 
02272     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
02273     [self setNeedsLayout];
02274 }
02275 
02276 - (id)valueForThemeAttribute:(CPString)aName inState:(CPThemeState)aState
02277 {
02278     if (!_themeAttributes || !_themeAttributes[aName])
02279         [CPException raise:CPInvalidArgumentException reason:[self className] + " does not contain theme attribute '" + aName + "'"];
02280 
02281     return [_themeAttributes[aName] valueForState:aState];
02282 }
02283 
02284 - (id)valueForThemeAttribute:(CPString)aName
02285 {
02286     if (!_themeAttributes || !_themeAttributes[aName])
02287         [CPException raise:CPInvalidArgumentException reason:[self className] + " does not contain theme attribute '" + aName + "'"];
02288 
02289     return [_themeAttributes[aName] value];
02290 }
02291 
02292 - (void)currentValueForThemeAttribute:(CPString)aName
02293 {
02294     if (!_themeAttributes || !_themeAttributes[aName])
02295         [CPException raise:CPInvalidArgumentException reason:[self className] + " does not contain theme attribute '" + aName + "'"];
02296 
02297     return [_themeAttributes[aName] valueForState:_themeState];
02298 }

02300 - (CPView)createEphemeralSubviewNamed:(CPString)aViewName
02301 {
02302     return nil;
02303 }
02304 
02305 - (CGRect)rectForEphemeralSubviewNamed:(CPString)aViewName
02306 {
02307     return _CGRectMakeZero();
02308 }
02309 
02310 - (CPView)layoutEphemeralSubviewNamed:(CPString)aViewName 
02311                            positioned:(CPWindowOrderingMode)anOrderingMode
02312       relativeToEphemeralSubviewNamed:(CPString)relativeToViewName
02313 {
02314     if (!_ephemeralSubviewsForNames)
02315     {
02316         _ephemeralSubviewsForNames = {};
02317         _ephemeralSubviews = [CPSet set];
02318     }
02319 
02320     var frame = [self rectForEphemeralSubviewNamed:aViewName];
02321 
02322     if (frame && !_CGRectIsEmpty(frame))
02323     {
02324         if (!_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName])
02325         {
02326             _ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName] = [self createEphemeralSubviewNamed:aViewName];
02327 
02328             [_ephemeralSubviews addObject:_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName]];
02329 
02330             if (_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName])
02331                 [self addSubview:_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName] positioned:anOrderingMode relativeTo:_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[relativeToViewName]];
02332         }
02333 
02334         if (_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName])
02335             [_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName] setFrame:frame];
02336     }
02337     else if (_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName])
02338     {
02339         [_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName] removeFromSuperview];
02340 
02341         [_ephemeralSubviews removeObject:_ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName]];
02342         delete _ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName];
02343     }
02344 
02345     return _ephemeralSubviewsForNames[aViewName];
02346 }

02350 var CPViewAutoresizingMaskKey       = @"CPViewAutoresizingMask",
02351     CPViewAutoresizesSubviewsKey    = @"CPViewAutoresizesSubviews",
02352     CPViewBackgroundColorKey        = @"CPViewBackgroundColor",
02353     CPViewBoundsKey                 = @"CPViewBoundsKey",
02354     CPViewFrameKey                  = @"CPViewFrameKey",
02355     CPViewHitTestsKey               = @"CPViewHitTestsKey",
02356     CPViewIsHiddenKey               = @"CPViewIsHiddenKey",
02357     CPViewOpacityKey                = @"CPViewOpacityKey",
02358     CPViewSubviewsKey               = @"CPViewSubviewsKey",
02359     CPViewSuperviewKey              = @"CPViewSuperviewKey",
02360     CPViewTagKey                    = @"CPViewTagKey",
02361     CPViewThemeStateKey             = @"CPViewThemeStateKey",
02362     CPViewWindowKey                 = @"CPViewWindowKey",
02363     CPViewNextKeyViewKey            = @"CPViewNextKeyViewKey",
02364     CPViewPreviousKeyViewKey        = @"CPViewPreviousKeyViewKey";
02365 
02366 @implementation CPView (CPCoding)
02367 
02373 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
02374 {
02375     // We create the DOMElement "early" because there is a chance that we 
02376     // will decode our superview before we are done decoding, at which point 
02377     // we have to have an element to place in the tree.  Perhaps there is 
02378     // a more "elegant" way to do this...?
02379 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
02380     _DOMElement = DOMElementPrototype.cloneNode(false);
02381 #endif
02382 
02383     // Also decode these "early".
02384     _frame = [aCoder decodeRectForKey:CPViewFrameKey];
02385     _bounds = [aCoder decodeRectForKey:CPViewBoundsKey];
02386 
02387     self = [super initWithCoder:aCoder];
02388     
02389     if (self)
02390     {
02391         // We have to manually check because it may be 0, so we can't use ||
02392         _tag = [aCoder containsValueForKey:CPViewTagKey] ? [aCoder decodeIntForKey:CPViewTagKey] : -1;
02393         
02394         _window = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPViewWindowKey];
02395         _subviews = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPViewSubviewsKey] || [];
02396         _superview = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPViewSuperviewKey];
02397         
02398         // FIXME: Should we encode/decode this?
02399         _registeredDraggedTypes = [CPSet set];
02400         _registeredDraggedTypesArray = [];
02401 
02402         _autoresizingMask = [aCoder decodeIntForKey:CPViewAutoresizingMaskKey] || CPViewNotSizable;
02403         _autoresizesSubviews = ![aCoder containsValueForKey:CPViewAutoresizesSubviewsKey] || [aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPViewAutoresizesSubviewsKey];
02404 
02405         _hitTests = ![aCoder containsValueForKey:CPViewHitTestsKey] || [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPViewHitTestsKey];
02406     
02407         // DOM SETUP
02408 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
02409         _DOMImageParts = [];
02410         _DOMImageSizes = [];
02411 
02412         CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMElement, NULL, _CGRectGetMinX(_frame), _CGRectGetMinY(_frame));
02413         CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMElement, _CGRectGetWidth(_frame), _CGRectGetHeight(_frame));
02414         
02415         var index = 0,
02416             count = _subviews.length;
02417     
02418         for (; index < count; ++index)
02419         {
02420             CPDOMDisplayServerAppendChild(_DOMElement, _subviews[index]._DOMElement);
02421             //_subviews[index]._superview = self;
02422         }
02423 #endif
02424 
02425         if ([aCoder containsValueForKey:CPViewIsHiddenKey])
02426             [self setHidden:[aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPViewIsHiddenKey]];
02427         else
02428             _isHidden = NO;
02429 
02430         if ([aCoder containsValueForKey:CPViewOpacityKey])
02431             [self setAlphaValue:[aCoder decodeIntForKey:CPViewOpacityKey]];
02432         else
02433             _opacity = 1.0;
02434 
02435         [self setBackgroundColor:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPViewBackgroundColorKey]];
02436 
02437         [self setupViewFlags];
02438 
02439         _theme = [CPTheme defaultTheme];
02440         _themeState = CPThemeState([aCoder decodeIntForKey:CPViewThemeStateKey]);
02441         _themeAttributes = {};
02442 
02443         var theClass = [self class],
02444             themeClass = [theClass themeClass],
02445             attributes = [theClass _themeAttributes],
02446             count = attributes.length;
02447 
02448         while (count--)
02449         {
02450             var attributeName = attributes[count--];
02451 
02452             _themeAttributes[attributeName] = CPThemeAttributeDecode(aCoder, attributeName, attributes[count], _theme, themeClass);
02453         }
02454 
02455         [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
02456         [self setNeedsLayout];
02457     }
02458 
02459     return self;
02460 }
02461 
02466 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
02467 {
02468     [super encodeWithCoder:aCoder];
02469     
02470     if (_tag !== -1)
02471         [aCoder encodeInt:_tag forKey:CPViewTagKey];
02472 
02473     [aCoder encodeRect:_frame forKey:CPViewFrameKey];
02474     [aCoder encodeRect:_bounds forKey:CPViewBoundsKey];
02475 
02476     // This will come out nil on the other side with decodeObjectForKey:
02477     if (_window !== nil)
02478         [aCoder encodeConditionalObject:_window forKey:CPViewWindowKey];
02479 
02480     var count = [_subviews count],
02481         encodedSubviews = _subviews;
02482 
02483     if (count > 0 && [_ephemeralSubviews count] > 0)
02484     {
02485         encodedSubviews = [encodedSubviews copy];
02486 
02487         while (count--)
02488             if ([_ephemeralSubviews containsObject:encodedSubviews[count]])
02489                 encodedSubviews.splice(count, 1);
02490     }
02491 
02492     if (encodedSubviews.length > 0)
02493         [aCoder encodeObject:encodedSubviews forKey:CPViewSubviewsKey];
02494 
02495     // This will come out nil on the other side with decodeObjectForKey:
02496     if (_superview !== nil)
02497         [aCoder encodeConditionalObject:_superview forKey:CPViewSuperviewKey];
02498 
02499     if (_autoresizingMask !== CPViewNotSizable)
02500         [aCoder encodeInt:_autoresizingMask forKey:CPViewAutoresizingMaskKey];
02501 
02502     if (!_autoresizesSubviews)
02503         [aCoder encodeBool:_autoresizesSubviews forKey:CPViewAutoresizesSubviewsKey];
02504 
02505     if (_backgroundColor !== nil)
02506         [aCoder encodeObject:_backgroundColor forKey:CPViewBackgroundColorKey];
02507 
02508     if (_hitTests !== YES)
02509         [aCoder encodeBool:_hitTests forKey:CPViewHitTestsKey];
02510 
02511     if (_opacity !== 1.0)
02512         [aCoder encodeFloat:_opacity forKey:CPViewOpacityKey];
02513 
02514     if (_isHidden)
02515         [aCoder encodeBool:_isHidden forKey:CPViewIsHiddenKey];
02516 
02517     var nextKeyView = [self nextKeyView];
02518 
02519     if (nextKeyView !== nil)
02520         [aCoder encodeConditionalObject:nextKeyView forKey:CPViewNextKeyViewKey];
02521 
02522     var previousKeyView = [self previousKeyView];
02523 
02524     if (previousKeyView !== nil)
02525         [aCoder encodeConditionalObject:previousKeyView forKey:CPViewPreviousKeyViewKey];
02526 
02527     [aCoder encodeInt:CPThemeStateName(_themeState) forKey:CPViewThemeStateKey];
02528 
02529     for (var attributeName in _themeAttributes)
02530         if (_themeAttributes.hasOwnProperty(attributeName))
02531             CPThemeAttributeEncode(aCoder, _themeAttributes[attributeName]);
02532 }
02533 
02534 @end
02535 
02536 var _CPViewFullScreenModeStateMake = function(aView)
02537 {
02538     var superview = aView._superview;
02539     
02540     return { autoresizingMask:aView._autoresizingMask, frame:CGRectMakeCopy(aView._frame), index:(superview ? [superview._subviews indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:aView] : 0), superview:superview };
02541 }
02542 
02543 var _CPViewGetTransform = function(/*CPView*/ fromView, /*CPView */ toView)
02544 {
02545     var transform = CGAffineTransformMakeIdentity(),
02546         sameWindow = YES,
02547         fromWindow = nil,
02548         toWindow = nil;
02549     
02550     if (fromView)
02551     {
02552         var view = fromView;
02553         
02554         // FIXME: This doesn't handle the case when the outside views are equal.
02555         // If we have a fromView, "climb up" the view tree until 
02556         // we hit the root node or we hit the toLayer.
02557         while (view && view != toView)
02558         {
02559             var frame = view._frame;
02560             
02561             transform.tx += _CGRectGetMinX(frame);
02562             transform.ty += _CGRectGetMinY(frame);
02563             
02564             if (view._boundsTransform)
02565             {
02566                 _CGAffineTransformConcatTo(transform, view._boundsTransform, transform);
02567             }
02568             
02569             view = view._superview;
02570         }
02571         
02572         // If we hit toView, then we're done.
02573         if (view === toView)
02574             return transform;
02575         
02576         else if (fromView && toView)
02577         {
02578             fromWindow = [fromView window];
02579             toWindow = [toView window];
02580             
02581             if (fromWindow && toWindow && fromWindow !== toWindow)
02582             {
02583                 sameWindow = NO;
02584                 
02585                 var frame = [fromWindow frame];
02586                 
02587                 transform.tx += _CGRectGetMinX(frame);
02588                 transform.ty += _CGRectGetMinY(frame);
02589             }
02590         }
02591     }
02592     
02593     // FIXME: For now we can do things this way, but eventually we need to do them the "hard" way.
02594     var view = toView;
02595     
02596     while (view)
02597     {
02598         var frame = view._frame;
02599             
02600         transform.tx -= _CGRectGetMinX(frame);
02601         transform.ty -= _CGRectGetMinY(frame);
02602         
02603         if (view._boundsTransform)
02604         {
02605             _CGAffineTransformConcatTo(transform, view._inverseBoundsTransform, transform);
02606         }
02607         
02608         view = view._superview;
02609     }
02610     
02611     if (!sameWindow)
02612     {
02613         var frame = [toWindow frame];
